hero.title: Nina Moore
hero.subtitle: Initiatory journeys, healing experiences, and transformative mentorship to awaken your deepest truth and power

pillar1.title: You can already feel it
pillar1.description: That quiet pull inside you, that whisper that you can rise above the loops and limitations.

pillar2.title: You desire to transmute your story
pillar2.description: You are ready to find the gold in the hardship and develop self mastery as you discover your uniqueness.

pillar3.title: You seek remembrance
pillar3.description: Of your power. Of your truth. Of the self you know you are underneath the layers of conditioning.

invitation.title: The Invitation
invitation.p1: Every journey is different — because every soul arrives with its own story, its own wounds, its own readiness.
invitation.p2: There is no script here, only attuned presence and deep listening.
invitation.p3: When you step into this space, you are not coming to "fix yourself."
invitation.p4: You are entering a sacred container for remembering your truth, clearing what no longer serves you, and opening to the self you have not yet dared to fully embody.

transformation.title: Now is the time for full embodied transformation
transformation.subtitle: I am here to walk with you as you build your living temple.
transformation.description: My work is to allow you to bridge your inner awakening and your outer life — helping you integrate your experiences, activate your true self, and embody the purpose you came here to live.
transformation.closing: It's a journey to find the way home to yourself.

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.description: Healing old patterns, stepping into leadership, transforming relationships, and creating conscious lives and communities.

opening.title: Opening
opening.description: Every session is a portal: an opening, an invitation to become more of who you are and step into your full radiance and purpose.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Transform your expression, identify your patterns, learn how to integrate your life experience, transform trauma into wisdom.

cta.title: Cycle of 4 sessions & ongoing support
cta.subtitle: Our 30 minutes connection call will help determine your needs and objectives

items.name: Cecile Gatto
items.outcome: From Considering Separation to Deepest Connection
items.text1: After 3 years feeling disconnected from my partner, Nina's Sacred Union work helped us rediscover intimacy we thought was lost. Within 8 sessions, we moved from considering separation to experiencing deeper connection than our honeymoon phase.
items.text2: Today, I have a clear vision for my projects, a peaceful and loving relationship with my partner, renewed balance with those around me, and the confidence to make empowered choices. We've now worked together for 4 years and continue to grow stronger together.

items.name: Benjamin Barda
items.text1: I came to Nina with creative block that had lasted 2 years. Through the Kundalini work, I unlocked not just my creativity but a wellspring of life force I didn't know existed. Within 6 weeks, I completed my album, launched my business, and felt alive again.
items.text2: The transformation was visceral and lasting. Nina opened wide the doors of consciousness, revealing new spaces of courage, joy, and poetry. I'm now living as the artist of my inner world, feeling generously supported and inspired no matter the situation.

items.name: Will Ashurst
items.outcome: Career Transition, Ancestral Healing, Leadership Emergence
items.text1: Working with Nina over the past year has been the most profound investment in myself I've ever made. I've navigated a career transition, healed ancestral wounds, and stepped into leadership I never thought possible.
items.text2: Her ability to hold space while challenging me forward is unmatched. She understands me deeply and interprets what I share with precision, love, and compassion. Together, we've illuminated areas of my life I didn't know needed attention. The healing and value I've gained has been life-changing.

items.title: Spiritual Quest
items.description: Connection to source, rituals, remembrance, soul and sacred

items.title: Creative Flow
items.description: Bringing back the spark, finding joy, self expression and trust

about.title: About me
bio: I am in service of the collective awakening and the expansion of consciousness.
I value the aliveness of emotions, embodied wisdom, and authentic pathways to freedom.
My field of expertise encompasses a wide array of methods and skills that I have nourished through years of practice and self-inquiry.
As a practitioner and human being, I meet people heart to heart and offer deep presence for growth, healing, and self-realization.
I believe that each individual carries a unique and invaluable gift into the world, waiting to be unraveled.
I am devoted to living in integrity with what wants to be expressed through each of us.

intro.p1: I welcome you to reach out if you feel called to this work. Whether you're seeking guidance through a life transition, integration support after a psychedelic experience, or simply curious to learn more about working together.

form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me what brings you here...

success.title: Thank you for reaching out
success.message: Your message has been received. I'll respond personally within 24-48 hours.
success.confirmation: Check your inbox for a confirmation email

info.languages: Sessions available in English, Spanish, and French

sacredUnion.title: Sacred Union
sacredUnion.subtitle: An ongoing transformation journey for couples ready to deepen their relationship and embark on profound healing and growth together.
description: You've entered the most transformative relationship dynamic of your life and it's kicking your ass. This program is here to hold you through the wild ride, providing anchors to return to when challenges arise.

Together, we'll explore trust, unconditional love, communication, shadow work, and transgenerational trauma healing. This is not traditional couples therapy — this is soul-level work for partners ready to transform.
This is ongoing work that evolves with your relationship. We begin with a 4-week foundation and continue as your journey unfolds, meeting regularly to navigate the depths of sacred partnership.

kundalini.title: Reignite Your Creativity
kundalini.subtitle: An ongoing transformational journey to awaken your creative essence and evolve into your most expressive self.
description: This is a sacred journey of creative awakening — a process of remembering and reclaiming the creative force that lives at your core. We work with the energy that wants to move through you and find its unique expression in the world.

Through this work, you'll experience a profound shift from constraint to flow, from doubt to trust, from silence to authentic self-expression. This journey supports your evolution into a life where creativity becomes your natural state of being.

Each session is uniquely tailored to unlock what's ready to emerge. We work with your creative blocks, limiting beliefs, and untapped potential to facilitate a transformation in how you create, express, and bring your gifts into the world.

This is a progressive evolution — not a one-time shift. We work together over time, nurturing your creative capacity and supporting the integration of your creative self into every aspect of your life.

retreats.title: Immersive Retreats
retreats.subtitle: Private 1:1 or intimate small group retreats for deep transformational work in a held, sacred container.
description: Sometimes transformation requires stepping away from daily life and immersing yourself fully in the work. These multi-day retreats offer a sacred container for profound healing, activation, and integration.

Whether you come alone for private 1:1 work, or bring your partner or a small group of friends, these retreats are designed to hold you through deep processes that require time, space, and complete presence.

You'll stay over for the duration of the retreat, allowing the work to unfold organically without the interruption of returning to daily responsibilities. This creates the conditions for breakthroughs that simply aren't possible in shorter sessions.
The retreat includes personalized healing sessions, energy work, somatic practices, nature immersion, and sacred ceremony tailored to what wants to emerge for you or your group.

items.title: Private 1:1 Retreats
items.description: Fully personalized multi-day immersions designed around your unique journey, offering deep one-on-one work in a safe, sacred container.

items.title: Couples Retreats
items.description: Intimate retreats for partners seeking to deepen their bond, navigate challenges, and unlock new levels of connection and intimacy.

items.title: Small Group Retreats
items.description: Bring your close friends for a shared transformational journey. Perfect for groups of 2-4 who want to experience healing and growth together.

items.title: Energetic Awakening
items.description: Activation of your life force energy, opening pathways for vitality, creativity, and expanded consciousness to flow freely through your being.

items.title: Deep Clearing
items.description: Release of stuck emotions, limiting beliefs, and energetic blockages that have been held in your body and field, creating space for new possibilities.

items.title: Embodied Transformation
items.description: Integration of higher states of consciousness into your daily life, allowing you to live from a place of authentic power and presence.

weeks.title: Building Trust & Unconditional Love
weeks.description: Setting intentions, exploring trust within yourself and your partner, understanding and practicing unconditional love, and identifying personal barriers to intimacy.

weeks.title: Communication & Shadow Work
weeks.description: Practicing vulnerability, deepening emotional intimacy, identifying and acknowledging your shadows, and learning to embrace the parts of yourself you've hidden.

weeks.title: Healing Transgenerational Trauma
weeks.description: Understanding inherited patterns, de-programming cellular trauma, and fostering inner growth together as you break free from limiting beliefs.

weeks.title: Integration & Celebration
weeks.description: Embracing change together, building resilience, celebrating your progress, and anchoring the transformation into your daily life.

principles.title: Core Principles
items: Trust the process, knowing that there is a world of subtleties beyond the conscious relationship dogma.
You're not healing only yourself. The work ripples far out — you are de-programming transgenerational trauma at a cellular, DNA level.
Welcome the thunderstorms. Use the energy of challenges to bring transformation instead of avoiding them.
You are souls on a mission.

howToBook.title: How to Book
howToBook.description: All programs begin with a discovery call to ensure alignment and readiness. We'll discuss your intentions, answer questions, and determine the best path forward together.

options.title: Payment Options
options.description: I accept Venmo, Zelle, bank transfer, and credit card. For multi-month programs, payment plans are available to make your investment more manageable.

plans.title: Payment Plans
plans.description: Flexible payment plans are available for all programs:
items: 3-payment plan: Divide total investment into 3 equal payments
Retreat deposit: $1,111 secures your spot, balance due 30 days before arrival

cancellation.title: Cancellation & Refund Policy
cancellation.description: Programs: Non-refundable after 7 days from purchase. If you need to discontinue during the program, we'll work with you on a prorated refund for remaining sessions. Retreats: Deposits are non-refundable. Cancellations more than 60 days before retreat receive 50% refund; less than 60 days are non-refundable. See our

items.quote: The Sacred Union program saved my relationship. Nina helped us break through years of defensive patterns and reconnect to the love that brought us together. We communicate with so much more honesty and tenderness now.
items.name: Rachel & David

items.quote: After years of creative blocks, the Kundalini Transmission program unlocked something profound in me. I've written an entire album, launched my business, and feel more alive than I have in a decade. Nina is a true guide.
items.name: Marcus L.

items.quote: The Bali retreat was life-changing. Being held in sacred space with Nina and a small group of seekers allowed me to release trauma I didn't even know I was carrying. I came home a different person—lighter, clearer, more whole.
items.name: Jennifer K.

cta.title: Ready to transform your relationship?
cta.subtitle: This program is for couples who trust their soul path and are ready to do the deep work.

services.title: Individual Sessions

hero.title: Individual Sessions
hero.subtitle: Single sessions and consultations to support your journey

services.intro: Whether you're curious about working together, need support during a specific transition, or want integration guidance after a transformative experience—these individual sessions offer focused, personalized attention.

discoveryCall.title: Discovery Call
discoveryCall.description: A complimentary conversation to explore if we're aligned. We'll discuss what you're seeking, what I offer, and whether this work feels right for you.
cover: Your current situation and what you're seeking
How I work and what to expect
Whether we're a good fit energetically
Next steps if you choose to move forward

singleSession.title: Single Session
singleSession.description: A deep-dive session for those seeking support with a specific challenge, transition, or integration need. This is transformational work in a focused container.
bestFor: Integration after a psychedelic or plant medicine experience
Navigating a specific life transition or challenge
Exploring what longer-term work might look like

couplesSession.title: Couples Session
couplesSession.description: A transformational session for couples seeking deeper intimacy, healing relationship wounds, or navigating a transition together. This is sacred union work.
bestFor: Couples facing communication or intimacy challenges
Healing from betrayal or breach of trust
Trying out our work before committing to a journey

integrationPackage.title: Integration Package
integrationPackage.description: Three 90-minute sessions spaced over 6 weeks to support integration of a profound experience—plant medicine, awakening, life transition, or breakthrough.
included: Somatic practices tailored to your experience

steps.title: Before We Meet
steps.description: After booking, you'll receive a brief intake form to help me understand what you're seeking. This ensures we make the most of our time together.

steps.title: During Our Session
steps.description: Sessions are conducted via video call. We work with a blend of conversation, somatic practices, breathwork, and energy transmission—tailored to what you need in the moment.

steps.title: After We Work Together
steps.description: You'll receive practices and integration support to help you embody what emerged. If you'd like to continue working together, we'll explore what that might look like.

whatToExpect.title: What to Expect

paragraphs.text: We don't just talk about your challenges—we work with them somatically through breath, sensation, movement, and energy. Insight happens, but it's insight that lands in your body.

paragraphs.bold: This work is held with reverence.
paragraphs.text: I approach each session as sacred space. What you share is held in complete confidentiality and with deep respect for your journey.

paragraphs.bold: This work meets you where you are.
paragraphs.text: I don't have a formula. Each session is responsive to what's alive in you, what's ready to be seen, felt, and integrated.

whatToExpect.closing: You don't need to know exactly what you need. You just need to show up with presence and willingness.

deeperWork.title: Ready for Deeper Work?
deeperWork.description: If you're seeking more sustained support, explore my multi-week programs and immersive retreats designed for profound transformation.

howToBook.title: How to Book
howToBook.description: All sessions begin with a discovery call to ensure we're a good fit. From there, we'll schedule your session and you'll receive booking confirmation with payment details.

methods.title: Payment Methods
methods.description: I accept Venmo, Zelle, bank transfer, and credit card. Payment is required before your session to secure your spot.

plans.title: Payment Plans
plans.description: Payment plans are available for the Integration Package. We can arrange 2 or 3 payments to make your investment more manageable.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.description: Please provide at least 48 hours notice for cancellations. Late cancellations or no-shows will be charged the full session fee. See our

items.quote: Working with Nina has been transformative. Her ability to hold space for deep emotional work while keeping me grounded in my body has been incredible. I've made more progress in a few sessions than years of traditional therapy.
items.name: Sarah M.

items.quote: Nina's somatic approach helped me reconnect with parts of myself I had shut down for years. She creates such a safe, compassionate space for exploration and healing. Highly recommend for anyone doing deep inner work.
items.name: James T.

items.quote: The couples session with Nina completely shifted how my partner and I communicate. She helped us see patterns we couldn't see on our own and gave us practical tools to deepen our connection. Worth every penny.
items.name: Maya & Alex

finalCta.title: Let's explore if this work is right for you
finalCta.subtitle: Start with a free discovery call—no commitment, just connection.
